name: Putrid Pirates
description:
A pirate game in very early development. The current gameplay is only a base for the treasure hunting part of the game.

Controls:

WASD or arrows to move. Space to dig.

Try and find the treasure by digging in the sand at the x marked on the map.

Notes:

You cannot move while digging

There is currently no way to collect the treasure. (Just try to find the brown box right now).

Features coming soon:

Better camera

Character animations

Actual treasure collection

Many many more. (Though not as soon)

Please give your thoughts and feedback.
